text: This is a list of episodes for the stop-motion television series Robot Chicken. The first episode aired on February 20, 2005, at 11:30 p.m. EST on Cartoon Network's Adult Swim block, and the eleventh season premiered on September 7, 2021, at 12:00 a.m. EDT. There have been a number of half-hour specials. == Series overview == == Specials == Title Directed by Written by Original air date U.S. viewers (millions) == References == == Other websites == * Adult Swim's Robot Chicken website * List of Category:Lists of television series episodes
title: List of Robot Chicken episodes
